summary.full_name: 22nd International Conference on Managed Programming Languages & Runtimes

subtopics: Managed languages (e.g., Java, Scala, JavaScript, Python, Ruby, C#, F#, Clojure, Groovy, Kotlin, R, Smalltalk, Racket, Rust, Go, Lua, MATLAB, Raku, Pony)
Portable intermediate representations (e.g., JVM, WebAssembly, RPython)
Managed runtime systems (e.g., GraalVM, Android Runtime, V8, JavaScriptCore, .NET)
VMs for mobile and embedded devices
Compiler and program verification and model checking
